column4: Hey, I have Ubuntu and Kubuntu 9.04 I cannot detect any wireless networks, I can only have wired connection.. I have updated/upgraded both, but still not working.
is it ok if I paste the result in a bin pls?
My wireless was working fine on 9.10 Ubuntu Gnome and KDE, but I couldnt keep working on 9.10 it kept crashing mu computer, so I had to switch back to 9.04
your module for the wireless card doesnt seemed to be loaded
please check if you are running the latest kernel
reboot and press shift or esc and check the kernel list
kernel updates are seamless, you dont need backup for that
I reboot and press esc or shift?
